# NestedCerts - AWS Certification Exam Prep Platform

> Master AWS certifications with daily practice exams, comprehensive analytics, and structured 30-day learning paths.

## Overview

NestedCerts is a modern SaaS platform offering exam preparation for 13 AWS certifications. Each certification includes 30 practice quizzes (20 questions each) and 2 full-length exams (65 questions each), totaling over 8,000 practice questions.

## Key Features

- 13 AWS certifications (Cloud Practitioner to Professional & Specialty levels)
- 30 quizzes + 2 exams per certification
- Real-time progress tracking and analytics
- Certificate generation upon completion
- Flexible pricing: subscriptions, bundles, or individual certs

## Pricing

- Monthly: $20/month - All certifications
- Annual: $70/year - All certifications
- Lifetime: $100 one-time - All certifications forever
- Individual Certs: $10 each
- Bundles: $25-$45 (Associate, Professional, Specialty)

## Legal

- Terms of Service: https://nestedcerts.com/terms
- Privacy Policy: https://nestedcerts.com/privacy
- Cancellation Policy: https://nestedcerts.com/cancellation-policy
- Refund Policy: https://nestedcerts.com/refund-policy

## Tech Stack

- Frontend: React 18 + TypeScript + Vite
- Styling: Tailwind CSS v4
- Backend: AWS Lambda + API Gateway + DynamoDB
- Auth: AWS Cognito
- Payments: Stripe (live mode)
- Hosting: S3 + CloudFront CDN

## Status

Production ready with zero security vulnerabilities, 95/100 SEO score, and full mobile responsiveness.
